flawed_nl_solution:
8:00 PM is equivalent to 20:00 hrs so he spent a total of 20-7 = <<20-7=10>>10 hours on the journey
He spent 25+10+25 = <<25+10+25=60>>60 minutes on stops
There are 60 minutes in an hour so he spent (60/60) = <<60/60=1>>1 hour on stops
Therefore, he spent 10-1 = <<10-1=9>>9 hours on the road.
#### 9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
